boost::numeric::ublas::vector_range

boost::numeric::ublas::vector_range< V > Class Template Reference

A vector referencing a continuous subvector of elements of vector v containing all elements specified by range. More...

Inherits vector_expression< vector_range< V > >.

Detailed Description

template<class V>
class boost::numeric::ublas::vector_range< V >

A vector range can be used as a normal vector in any expression. If the specified range falls outside that of the index range of the vector, then the vector_range is not a well formed Vector Expression and access to an element outside of index range of the vector is undefined.

Template Parameters:
V the type of vector referenced (for example vector<double>)
